title: Netflix for Apple TV now uses redesigned video player in tvOS 15, supporting new Siri Remote
content:
Netflix is rolling out a visual update to Apple TV users. With a new version of its app, the company is now making available the tvOS 15 player on its platform when you’re watching a TV show, movie, standup, documentary, or any other visual content.
